Construct example without financial data

Source: R/example_data.R
example_without_financial.Rd

Construct example without financial data

Usage

example_without_financial(...)

Arguments

...

Passed to tibble().

Value

A tibble()

See also

Other example datasets: example_financial()

Examples

example_without_financial()
#> # A tibble: 3 × 8
#>   company_name emission_category grouping_emission scenario  year
#>   <chr>        <chr>             <chr>             <chr>    <dbl>
#> 1 a            low               all               1.5C RPS  2030
#> 2 a            medium            all               1.5C RPS  2030
#> 3 a            high              all               1.5C RPS  2030
#> # ℹ 3 more variables: emissions_profile_equal_weight <dbl>,
#> #   emissions_profile_worst_case <dbl>, emissions_profile_best_case <dbl>

#' # Add columns
example_without_financial(new = 1)
#> # A tibble: 3 × 9
#>     new company_name emission_category grouping_emission scenario  year
#>   <dbl> <chr>        <chr>             <chr>             <chr>    <dbl>
#> 1     1 a            low               all               1.5C RPS  2030
#> 2     1 a            medium            all               1.5C RPS  2030
#> 3     1 a            high              all               1.5C RPS  2030
#> # ℹ 3 more variables: emissions_profile_equal_weight <dbl>,
#> #   emissions_profile_worst_case <dbl>, emissions_profile_best_case <dbl>

#' # Pass column names stored in vectors
company_name <- "company_name"
example_financial(!!company_name := "c")
#> # A tibble: 1 × 10
#>   company_name bank_id amount_total emission_category grouping_emission
#>   <chr>        <chr>          <dbl> <chr>             <chr>            
#> 1 c            a                 10 medium            all              
#> # ℹ 5 more variables: profile_ranking <dbl>, transition_risk_score <dbl>,
#> #   equal_weight_finance <dbl>, worst_case_finance <dbl>,
#> #   best_case_finance <dbl>
